item.description:
Host: Claire P.
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!
If the weather permits, I think it would be fun to go hiking on the trails at Cutter Woods. Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way. This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout. I thought that we would enjoy nature for about two hours, with a few breaks/stops along the trail. So come and enjoy some fresh air, beautiful views, and all this while in good company of friends.

We will meet at 2:00 pm in the parking lot. Because this is conversation land, I can only give you the address of the home that is directly across from the parking lot. The sign is currently off its post and on the ground so please look for the unpaved driveway across from 117 Sherburne Rd.

Please remember to bring plenty of fluids and to dress in layers so that you will be comfortable the whole time we are out on the trails.
If anyone cares to, we can then go grab a bite to eat or enjoy a hot chocolate, at a nearby restaurant. I hope to see you there.

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897
Location: Across from 117 Sherburne Rd, Pelham NH
Liability Release - AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and her heirs, and all members and participants of this Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. All meetup activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for my white Toyota Corolla

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Hiking at Cutter Woods in Pelham NH
